name: Raider of the Dark Temple
description:
(CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED)

Find the treasure deep within the temple! The temple is very dark and filled with traps so be careful! Fortunately you brought a torch, but
be warned: Move too quickly, and your torch may go out. That's right,
the Less you move, the More light you have!

How to Play

Navigate through the level while avoiding all traps. If your light goes out, hurry to the exit
or a torch, before the darkness within the temple consumes you. The treasure lies in the deepest part of the temple.

Controls
KeyboardController
MoveA,DLeft stick
JumpWA button (✕)
InteractEB button (○)
Credits

Desmazio: Programming
SideUpDown: Art
lapspider45 (@lapspider45): Music, Sound Design
Adjaar: Design

Made for Blackthornprod Jam #3
Theme: Less is More

Asset/Source disclosure
  • Sound effects were based on free (CC0) sources from freesound.org. A full list of the used artifacts can be found in the Github repo (be patient until it's made public)
  • No other premade assets were used.
